a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Malnutrition: Prevalence of childhood stunting, male vs.
Share of children younger than 5 years, male versus female, that fall below two standard deviations from the median
height-for-age of the WHO Child Growth Standards.
Prevalence of stunting, female (% of children under 5)
Prevalence of stunting, male (% of children under 5)
Data source: UNICEF, World Health Organization and World Bank
